divs: sighting detailsthere where two, the first one looked like a normal air craft,but it was on fire until it slowed down to a slow western path.then it turn to a giant black oval shape, the best i can say is black water ballons thay seem to move as if thay where fill with water? and then both took the same path to the west. now when i look at them though my 4\30 bushnells,stright above my location i must say i'v never seen anything like this before. it actuly scared me!
Summary: It came in off the south atlantic ocean over the port st lucie nuclear plant>
trends: There have been no other sightings in White City
This sighting has never been favorited.
